description: [KONNI](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0356) has modified registry keys of ComSysApp, Svchost, and xmlProv on the machine to gain persistence.(Citation: Medium KONNI Jan 2020)(Citation: Malwarebytes Konni Aug 2021)

external_references.description: Karmi, D. (2020, January 4). A Look Into Konni 2019 Campaign. Retrieved April 28, 2020.
Threat Intelligence Team. (2021, August 23). New variant of Konni malware used in campaign targetting Russia. Retrieved January 5, 2022.
